import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import "./assets/css/main.css" import { MdSettings } from 'react-icons/md' import Axios from 'axios' const NavbarAccount = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const path = useLocation(); const handleSubmit = () => { const session = localStorage.getItem('session') const [data, setData] = useState ([]) data.map((notes) => { console.log(notes.noteslist) localStorage.setItem('noteslist', (notes.noteslist)) }) Axios.get('http://localhost:8081/MainPage', { params: { session: session } }) .then(res => { setData(res.data) navigate('/MainPage') }) } return (

); }; export default NavbarAccount
